```{r}
require(tidyverse)
require(leaflet)
```

please download a symbol as svg format from https://iconmonstr.com/ and edit it in illustrator. Once edited export using save for web function to specify the width and height of icon symbol
```{r}
salmon = makeIcon(iconUrl = 'fishIcon.png',
                  iconRetinaUrl = 'fishIcon.png',
                  iconWidth =  51, 
                  iconHeight = 34)


tibble(lat = c(-6.81, -6.825822287918327, -6.80762697650438),
       lon = c(39.3, 39.28814364894883, 39.29591132582143), 
       name = "Mikoko", "Mbwaya", "Nimbe") %>% 
  # st_as_sf(coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326) %>% 
  leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(lng = ~lon, lat = ~lat,icon = salmon, popup = ~name)
```
